mapper.select: SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id WHERE am_id = #{amId};

SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id;

SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id WHERE a.am_category = 0;

SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id WHERE a.am_category <= 1;

SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id WHERE a.am_category <= 2;

SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id WHERE a.am_category <= 3;

SELECT a.am_id, a.am_name, a.am_desc, a.am_expire_time, a.am_qualified_num, a.am_serial_num, a.am_used_time, a.am_category, ac.ac_id, ac.ac_name, ac.ac_to_airline FROM am a LEFT JOIN aircraft ac ON a.ac_id = ac.ac_id WHERE a.am_category <= 4;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO am
am_name,
am_desc,
am_expire_time,
am_qualified_num,
am_used_time,
ac_id,
am_serial_num,
#{amName},
#{amDesc},
#{amExpireTime},
#{amQualifiedNum},
#{amUsedTime},
#{aircraft.acId},
#{amSerialNum},
